Uses of Class
rogel.io.fopl.formulas.Formula

  • Packages that use Formula 
    Package Description
    rogel.io.fopl.formulas
    Classes related to Formulas within FOPL.
    rogel.io.fopl.formulas.operators
    Contains classes that implement the range of AbstractOperator Formulas.
    rogel.io.fopl.proof
    Contains classes relevant to logic proofs with FOPL.
    rogel.io.fopl.proof.tree
    The classes in this package form the foundation of the logic-based reasoner, which solves the logical satisfiability problem: given a set of facts about some domain, and a query over that domain, does there exist a set of Substitutions that satisfy the query?

    • Uses of Formula in rogel.io.fopl.formulas

      Subclasses of Formula in rogel.io.fopl.formulas 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Predicate
      A Predicate names a relation between Terms in a domain of discourse.

    • Uses of Formula in rogel.io.fopl.formulas.operators

      Subclasses of Formula in rogel.io.fopl.formulas.operators 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractOperator
      An AbstractOperator is a Formula whose value is defined by the type of operator the class describes.
      class  AndOperator
      An AndOperator is an AbstractOperator Formula that computes the logical conjunction of its constituent Formulas as its value.
      class  NotOperator
      A NotOperator is an AbstractOperator Formula that computes the logical opposite of its constituent Formula as its value.
      class  OrOperator
      An OrOperator is an AbstractOperator Formula that computes the logical disjunction of its constituent Formulas as its value.
      Methods in rogel.io.fopl.formulas.operators that return Formula 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Formula AbstractOperator.getOperand(int index)
      Gets the Formula that is at the given index in the list of operands.
      Formula AbstractOperator.getOperatorHead()
      Gets the operand Formula at the head of the list of operands.
      Constructors in rogel.io.fopl.formulas.operators with parameters of type Formula 
      Constructor and Description
      AndOperator(Formula... operands)
      Constructs an AndOperator over the operand Formulas.
      NotOperator(Formula operand)
      Constructs a NotOperator over the operand Formula.
      OrOperator(Formula... operands)
      Constructs an OrOperator over the operand Formulas.

    • Uses of Formula in rogel.io.fopl.proof

      Methods in rogel.io.fopl.proof that return Formula 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Formula HornClause.getAntecedent()
      Gets this HornClause's antecedent if it exists, null otherwise.
      Constructors in rogel.io.fopl.proof with parameters of type Formula 
      Constructor and Description
      HornClause(Predicate consequent, Formula antecedent)
      Constructor for a HornClause with one positive literal and a goal clause (which represents implicitly disjunctive negated literals).

    • Uses of Formula in rogel.io.fopl.proof.tree

      Methods in rogel.io.fopl.proof.tree with parameters of type Formula 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AbstractSolutionNode SolutionNodeFactory.getSolver(Formula goal, RuleSet rules, Substitution parentSolution)
      This method generates a new child goal node appropriate for the parameter goal Formula: If the Formula is a Predicate, this method returns a PredicateSolutionNode.
